author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam meets one of the original hero costumes for Buddy the Elf from the beloved Christmas movie Elf! The details of this costume--from the intricate embroidery work to the mix of materials used--make it truly larger than life, and an iconic part of this modern Christmas classic. 

Learn more about this prop and see more details at: https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/462
Adam's Elf elevator build: https://youtu.be/Jc8APxaaiHw

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
